text.speaker: story
text.text: You crawl awkwardly through the far to small hole behind the shattered mirror.

text.speaker: story
text.text: Hello Jack? I think you forgot where you were for a minute, you're in Whitetaker Castle at a diner. Downstairs is boisterous, you needed some rest and distance from it all. Now you're here.

text.speaker: indent
text.text: Now, let us just take a short second, so that I can show you some music, that you may want to pay attention to should you hear it ever again...

text.speaker: indent
text.text: Jack, I apologize for taking so much of your time. Now dive into this world and enjoy, but also: be careful!
